sub_categories.title: Child Welfare
sub_categories.short_description: Innovative case management system that fuses business processes and operations to promote usability, achieve efficiencies, realize savings, improve workforce mobility, and increase organizational agility. This system focuses on improving child and family outcomes and adhering to Federal CCWIS regulations and principles for future certification.

sub_categories.title: Child Support
sub_categories.short_description: Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for Child Support Case Management systems. This solution combines the class-leading capabilities of the Salesforce cloud platform with deep functional capabilities drawn from Deloitte’s 35 years of child support system implementation experience.

sub_categories.title: Lobby Case Management
sub_categories.short_description: Native iOS tablet application used by human services agencies and partner/providers to provide point-of-interaction assistance with programs such as Medicaid, SNAP, TANF, and Child Care. OneView is a pocket-sized power tool that improves agency efficiency by cutting down back-office workload via speedy front-office engagement by combining capabilities like mobile capture of verification documents with an intelligent recommendation engine to quickly connect customers with community resources.

sub_categories.title: GoCase Worker Field Service Tools
sub_categories.short_description: Mobile solution that enables online & offline field work including data collection, such as interview, investigation, and assessment by leveraging features that are unique to mobile devices such as GPS, Maps, Audio, and Photo, Digital Signature, and Dictation. The dashboard allows caseworkers to organize and manage their daily appointments, alerts, and communications (chat) while on the move and can integrate with back-end systems.

sub_categories.title: Inspections
sub_categories.short_description: Enables examiners in the field to connect with their Headquarters to more efficiently and effectively scope, schedule, plan, conduct and report on examinations. This solution integrates workflow processing, data analytics, and case management best practices on a scalable, enterprise-ready platform built for organizations that frequently experience changing business processes and rules to be flexible enough to cost effectively meet both market and regulatory demands.

sub_categories.title:
RFI Case
Management
sub_categories.short_description: Controlled Correspondence is a suite of inquiry intake and management applications that assist federal agency staff with the intake, assignment, escalation, and response to requests for information from the general public or other agencies.

sub_categories.title: Integrated Eligibility Web App Self-Service
sub_categories.short_description: This solution transforms the self-service delivery model from program-focused to citizen centric through an enhanced user experience designed to be highly available and scaleable utilizing the Salesforce Platform. The portal is intended to provide a holistic and proactive approach dedicated to identifying the root cause of individuals’ problems and improving outcomes for customers.

sub_categories.title: Integrated Eligibility Mobile App Self-Service
sub_categories.short_description: Enables customers to apply for and manage their benefits from the convenience of their mobile device. This mobile application empowers customers to stay in compliance with program eligibility by having real-time access and capabilities related to their case status, application, and documents anywhere.

sub_categories.title: Child Welfare Self-Service
sub_categories.short_description: This solutiom gives customers the ability to report and submit suspected incidents of child abuse and/or neglect directly to a child welfare intake unit. The portal captures the description of the incident, key individuals involved, and reporter contact information.

sub_categories.title: Child Support Self-Service
sub_categories.short_description: Provides families and partners with direct access to their case, allowing them to see order information, make payments, and upload documents.

sub_categories.title: Work Participation Req. Self-Service
sub_categories.short_description: Allows the public to maintain compliance with work participation requirements of programs such as Medicaid, SNAP, and TANF from the convenience of a website or mobile device.  Functionality includes features such as reporting activities, reporting job applications, searching for resources, requesting exemptions or good cause, and discovering training opportunities.

sub_categories.title: EBT Mobile App
sub_categories.short_description: All-in-one solution for providing SNAP, WIC, and TANF recipients a space to plan, spend, and track their nutritional benefits from the convenience of their mobile device.  EBT Mobile includes functionality for budgeting EBT balances as well as organizing shopping trips and meal planning to make every dollar count and last longer.

sub_categories.title: X11/311 Self-Service
sub_categories.short_description: The X11 module of govCONNECT provides agencies with a service request solution that prioritizes user experience and enables capabilities empowering them to best serve their residents/citizens.

sub_categories.title: Licensing and Permitting Self-Service
sub_categories.short_description: Provides licensed professionals and businesses with a modern, self-service experience to perform functions such as reviewing licensure maintenance requirements, pay fees, submit service requests, and obtain permits. The email communications framework of the Customer Portal allows renewal reminders to be sent automatically and sends email communications to secondary credentialers.

sub_categories.title: FDA Company Approvals and eSubmissions
sub_categories.short_description: Custom-designed eSubmission portal to allow software-based medical device companies to apply for and receive FDA Pre-Cert status.  The solution interface guides users through application questions for FDA Pre-Cert, as well as for each product submission.

sub_categories.title: Vector XD: Cust. Mapping Delivery Accelerator
sub_categories.short_description: Digital application that helps organizations embed human-centered design into the way they deliver products, services, and experience to their customers by providing a structured way to identify customers and their needs, model the complex ways customers currently engage with an organization, its systems, and its partners, and determine how well the organization is meeting customer needs. Allows Deloitte to easily identify opportunities for improvement, determine how any changes might impact existing technologies or processes, and keep the customer front and center as we elevate the human experience.

sub_categories.title: Integrated Eligibility
sub_categories.short_description: Industry leading solution for Integrated Eligibility that has been Implemented in over 25 states and transformed integrated case management and eligibility determination for programs such as Medicaid, SNAP, TANF, and Child Care. Today, HHS NextGen has been rearchitected atop the Salesforce cloud platform and infused with the power of the govCONNECT platform to provide world-class user experience, scalability, and functional capability.

sub_categories.title: Child Care
sub_categories.short_description: Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for Child Care Case Management systems. This solution combines the class-leading capabilities of the Salesforce cloud platform with deep functional capabilities drawn from Deloitte’s decades of child care system implementation experience.

sub_categories.title: Work Participation Requirements
sub_categories.short_description: Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for work requirements of Medicaid, SNAP, and TANF program that combines the class-leading capabilities of the Salesforce cloud platform with deep functional capabilities drawn from Deloitte’s decades of human services implementation experience. WorkPath helps both customers and agencies remain compliant with work requirements through extensive functionality such as activity tracking, checklists, and integration with business and customer portals.

sub_categories.title: Health Insurance Premium Payments
sub_categories.short_description: Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for enabling state agencies to operationalize HIPP. This solution combines features of eligibility determination with program effectiveness measurements to provide comprehensive capabilities for States to realize significant Medicaid program savings.

sub_categories.title: Hearings and Appeals
sub_categories.short_description: Standalone Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for operationalizing processes for managing and scheduling hearings and appeals cases, across any number of programs. Key functionality includes automatic appointment scheduling, electronic dockets, time tracking, case tracking, and contact management.

sub_categories.title: Behavioral Nudges Ecosystem
sub_categories.short_description: Microservice solution that examines large and varied data sets to uncover hidden patterns and data correlations to nudge recipients, case workers, and business partners to make informed decisions.

sub_categories.title: Acquisition Tracking
sub_categories.short_description: Enables large contracting providers the ability to track contract details  and status, vendor contact management, planned and actual spend, and reporting/dashboards. The spend management tool has the ability to tie into existing contract management tools such as FPDS, USA Spending, and other source systems that have integration capabilities.

sub_categories.title: Conference Room Scheduling
sub_categories.short_description: Simplifies the process of reserving conference rooms and other spaces within an office or shared workplace. The application ensures that organizers have the necessary accommodations for important meetings, and at the same time, office managers maintain an accurate, up-to-date view of how company resources are being utilized. The Conference Room Scheduler consists of a front-end to allow an organizer to submit requests and an administrative back-end to allow administrators to review and manage room reservations and status.

sub_categories.title: CIO Management
sub_categories.short_description: One-stop shop for end-users to "launch" their day by providing a centralized location to access all of their Salesforce applications, as well as other business applications (i.e., SharePoint, SAP, Oracle, etc.) via data driven app tiles that are controlled by metadata, attributes, and related objects making it flexible, configurable, and easily scalable. This solution is connected to CBP’s Active Directory and provides PIV Authenticated Single Sign-On to allow users to authenticate and access all of their applications without having to login in to different applications multiple time.

sub_categories.title: Dynamic Case Management Delivery Accelerator
sub_categories.short_description: Tool neutral framework to capture, process, and analyze case-related data, improve customer service, drive process efficiency, and enable streamlined data analysis by allowing organizations to integrate case and work-flow processing, data analytics, and case management best practices on a scalable, technology-neutral, enterprise platform. DCM is able to provide consistent and real-time access to data through a multitude of different channels (web and mobile) while improving the timeliness, quality, and efficiency of services provided to stakeholders.

sub_categories.title: govCONNECT Framework Delivery Accelerator
sub_categories.short_description: Robust collection of framework components that sit atop the Salesforce platform. The govCONNECT Framework enables rapid delivery of complex government solutions with high quality and lower-cost.

sub_categories.title: Complaints Tracking Management
sub_categories.short_description: State-of-the-art CRM system on the Salesforce platform that supports the scalability, agility, and quality of consumer inquiry and complaint handling services and tools. Mosaic streamlines complaint submission using a “turbo-tax” like data-driven process, incorporates a complex workflow that efficiently and accurately routes complaints to companies, and provides three portals for company, government, and congressional users to easily manage and track the status of complaints.

sub_categories.title: Asset Management
sub_categories.short_description: Enables accurate inventory tracking of assets, management of asset requests, and the assignment of assets to staff. The application provides a single location for operators to manage inventories and items, as well as, requests. The scalability and flexibility of this application allows for a variety of asset types to be tracked within the system.

sub_categories.title: Grants Management
sub_categories.short_description: Salesforce based Award Management Platform (AMP) that promotes effective integrated program management, evaluation, and internal and external stakeholder collaboration for cooperative agreements. AMP provides configurable program-specific communities and standardizes the user experience.

sub_categories.title: UI Builder Delivery Accelerator
sub_categories.short_description: Cloud-based, low-code application development platform with a built-in UI Framework tool and a configurable code generation script, Figura enables rapid application development in a variety of destination technology stacks such as Salesforce, React, Angular, and Java.

sub_categories.title: Document Management System
sub_categories.short_description: Provides standard API to upload, store,  scan, categorize, retrieve, view and annotate documents.

sub_categories.title: MCI
sub_categories.short_description: Lightweight tool that can be used within our solutions to provide clients with customizable MCI services depending on their functional needs and readiness.​ The MCI Microservice is an efficient, robust, transparent, and configurable single source repository that unifies real-time updates from multiple sources and publishes to subscribing agencies.

sub_categories.title: Client Correspondence
sub_categories.short_description: Managed Software as a Service platform that provides a secure and compliant system with minimal maintenance overhead for various day to day infrastructure management. CC Microservices is an efficient, robust, transparent, and configurable single source repository that provides platform independent solution for various correspondence needs that can be plugged with any major service provider like OpenText, GMC Software, Xerox (XMPie) etc.

sub_categories.title: Land Management
sub_categories.short_description: Tool that manages submission, approval, inspections, and tracking of land claims. The product seamlessly integrates with geo-spatial software and databases along with a rules engine that process complex approval rules and a “concierge” facility to help claimants through the application process

sub_categories.title: Tour Management
sub_categories.short_description: Self-service interface which enable an organization's staff to schedule campus/complex tours from an accessible, user-friendly web interface. The system manages tour capacity and availability and can set future schedules based on a set of configurable rules via administrative console (back-end).

sub_categories.title: Facilities Management
sub_categories.short_description: Allows any group who provides facilities services to provide their end-users with an easily accessible, web intake form. The Facilities Requests app also provides an administrative back-end application which allows the facilities management service provider to create, review, and manage facilities requests while also tracking the associated costs.

sub_categories.title: Cost Allocated Time Tracking
sub_categories.short_description: Modern time reporting system that allows users to capture their daily time for all user fee funded activities. The system was designed and developed to meet the multi-tier hierarchy structure required by the FDA (CDER) and is scalable to support additional Center requirements with configurable user profiles that limit access to only those activities specific to an individual’s Center/Office/Role.

sub_categories.title: Hiring Management
sub_categories.short_description: Interactive portal that supports tracking of an individual’s onboarding status via two portals: an Applicant-facing community and a back-end Manager view for application management.  This further extends itself to existing data sources through integration with the Personal Identity Verification (PIV) system for data ingestion and the Access Management System (AMS) to support single-sign-on capabilities.

sub_categories.title: GoCase Interactive Learning
sub_categories.short_description: Mobile training application that enables professionals to gain the skills they need to be field experts on day one in a safe and consequence-free environment. Users are prompted with multiple choice questions that evaluate their response and provide live feedback on improvement areas. GoCase Learning paired with the Story Editor application allows its users to generate new content to share with their team using the mobile app.

sub_categories.title: GoCase VR Learning
sub_categories.short_description: Mobile and desktop based application that allows field work trainees to experience real-life scenarios in a virtual reality environment from any location. The application uses 3D images of buildings, homes, furniture, and everyday objects to simulate real-life situations in the field in an interactive space where trainees can explore the environment and identify risks and issues while receiving feedback on areas they need to sharpen their skills.

sub_categories.title: GoCase Community Story Editor
sub_categories.short_description: Cloud-based online site for content collaboration shared throughout the country by allowing users to share their custom characters, stories, and lesson plans for GoCase applications. By creating a virtual team environment, GoCase Community allows users the ability to download user created content to share with their teams.

app_details.asset_description:
HHS NextGen for Child Welfare is the country’s first cloud-based comprehensive Child Welfare CRM solution in production. This innovative case management system fuses business processes and operations to promote usability, achieve efficiencies, realize savings, improve workforce mobility, and increase organizational agility. The system focuses on improving child and family outcomes and adhering to Federal CCWIS regulations and principles for future certification. The flexible CRM platform, infused with the power of the govCONNECT platform, increases the ability to react to policy and regulation changes at the local, State, and Federal levels.
Related Solutions:
• Child Welfare Self-Service
app_details.short_description: Innovative case management system that fuses business processes and operations to promote usability, achieve efficiencies, realize savings, improve workforce mobility, and increase organizational agility. This system focuses on improving child and family outcomes and adhering to Federal CCWIS regulations and principles for future certification.

app_details.asset_description:
HHS NextGen for Child Support, powered by govCONNECT, is a next generation, Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for Child Support Case Management systems. This solution combines the class-leading capabilities of the Salesforce cloud platform with deep functional capabilities drawn from Deloitte’s 35 years of child support system implementation experience.
The Deloitte and Salesforce child support platform can provide child support agencies with many benefits, including:
• A proven cloud platform with modern user experience that is tailored to managing child support cases
• Relationship management capabilities to visualize complex cases and focus on factors impacting success
• Integrated workflow and work management features that focus work on the most timely and impactful case actions
• Deloitte child support experience combined with Salesforce Einstein analytics technology to help reveal valuable insights from performance and operational data to provide case workers and supervisors insights into case segmentation, next appropriate action, and program trends
• Data integration services utilizing Mulesoft allow incremental modernization and advanced integration with partner systems
• A customer-centric, agile implementation approach designed to overcome internal silos that can hinder the customer experience.

Related Solutions:
• Child Support Self-Service
app_details.short_description: Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for Child Support Case Management systems. This solution combines the class-leading capabilities of the Salesforce cloud platform with deep functional capabilities drawn from Deloitte’s 35 years of child support system implementation experience.

app_details.asset_description: OneView, powered by govCONNECT, is a native iOS tablet application used by human services agencies and partner/providers to provide point-of-interaction assistance with programs such as Medicaid, SNAP, TANF, and Child Care. Combining line-busting capabilities such as mobile capture of verification documents with an intelligent recommendation engine to quickly connect customers with community resources, OneView is a pocket-sized power tool that improves agency efficiency by cutting down back-office workload via speedy front-office engagement.
app_details.short_description: Native iOS tablet application used by human services agencies and partner/providers to provide point-of-interaction assistance with programs such as Medicaid, SNAP, TANF, and Child Care. OneView is a pocket-sized power tool that improves agency efficiency by cutting down back-office workload via speedy front-office engagement by combining capabilities like mobile capture of verification documents with an intelligent recommendation engine to quickly connect customers with community resources.

app_details.asset_description:
GoCase Worker is a mobile solution that enables offline field work and data collection, such as interview, investigation, and assessment. GoCase Worker has been adapted to multiple use cases, such as facility inspections and Child Welfare home visits. The GoCase Worker mobile app leverages features that are unique to mobile devices such as GPS, Maps, Audio, Photo, Video, Digital Signature and Dictation. Furthermore, the app includes a safety feature that allows caseworkers to make SOS calls if they feel unsafe or have an emergency situation. The dashboard allows caseworkers to organize and manage their daily appointments. It allows workers to check-in to specific locations and find directions. The check-in process improves the accountability and increases the safety of the caseworkers. Additionally, the caseworkers can manage their tasks, alerts and communications (aka Chat) from dashboard.

Case Overview provides a quick snapshot about the case information including milestones, activity logs, allegations, interview, notes, evidence and assessments. Also, it provides quick access to various sections of case information such as members, investigation, drug and alcohol etc. The mobile app architecture seamlessly integrates with both on premise and cloud solutions and available for both iOS and Android planforms. It has built-in offline framework that allows workers to perform their job even if there isn’t any network.
app_details.short_description: Mobile solution that enables online & offline field work including data collection, such as interview, investigation, and assessment by leveraging features that are unique to mobile devices such as GPS, Maps, Audio, and Photo, Digital Signature, and Dictation. The dashboard allows caseworkers to organize and manage their daily appointments, alerts, and communications (chat) while on the move and can integrate with back-end systems.

app_details.asset_description:
Deloitte’s ExaminerConnect solution enables examiners in the field to connect with their Headquarters back in the office Agency to more efficiently and effectively scope, schedule, plan, conduct and report on examinations. This solution integrates workflow processing, data analytics, and case management best practices on a scalable, enterprise-ready platform. ExaminerConnect is built for organizations that frequently experience changing business processes and rules to be flexible enough to cost effectively meet both market and regulatory demands. Primary solution components include:
Workflow management, Content and document storage, Rules management, Resource scheduling, Time tracking and management, Correspondence / Communications management and Analytic dashboards.
app_details.short_description: Enables examiners in the field to connect with their Headquarters to more efficiently and effectively scope, schedule, plan, conduct and report on examinations. This solution integrates workflow processing, data analytics, and case management best practices on a scalable, enterprise-ready platform built for organizations that frequently experience changing business processes and rules to be flexible enough to cost effectively meet both market and regulatory demands.

app_details.asset_description: Controlled Correspondence is a suite of inquiry intake and management applications that assist federal agency staff with the intake, assignment, escalation, and response to requests for information from the general public or other agencies.
app_details.short_description: Controlled Correspondence is a suite of inquiry intake and management applications that assist federal agency staff with the intake, assignment, escalation, and response to requests for information from the general public or other agencies.

app_details.asset: HHS NextGen Customer Portal for IE
app_details.asset_description: HHS NextGen Customer Portal for IE, powered by govCONNECT, transforms the self-service delivery model from program-focused to citizen centric through an enhanced user experience. The portal is intended to provide a holistic and proactive approach dedicated to identifying the root cause of individuals’ problems and improving outcomes for customers. The system was designed to be highly available and scalable utilizing the Salesforce Platform. The platform functions as a single-entry point for customers to apply for State programs and discover local resources. Additionally, citizens can view their active benefits, report changes to their case, reapply for existing benefits, download letters sent by the department, and upload documents.
app_details.short_description: This solution transforms the self-service delivery model from program-focused to citizen centric through an enhanced user experience designed to be highly available and scaleable utilizing the Salesforce Platform. The portal is intended to provide a holistic and proactive approach dedicated to identifying the root cause of individuals’ problems and improving outcomes for customers.

app_details.app_title: Vector XD: Customer Mapping Delivery Accelerator
app_details.asset_description: VectorXD is a digital application that can help organizations embed human-centered design into the way they deliver products, services, and experience to their customers. The application provides a structured means to identify customers and their needs, model the complex ways customers currently engage with an organization, its systems, and its partners, and determine how well the organization is meeting customer needs. By digitizing and connecting the information about the organization and its customers, Deloitte can more easily identify opportunities for improvement, determine how any changes might impact existing technologies or processes, and keep the customer front and center as we elevate the human experience.
app_details.short_description: Digital application that helps organizations embed human-centered design into the way they deliver products, services, and experience to their customers by providing a structured way to identify customers and their needs, model the complex ways customers currently engage with an organization, its systems, and its partners, and determine how well the organization is meeting customer needs. Allows Deloitte to easily identify opportunities for improvement, determine how any changes might impact existing technologies or processes, and keep the customer front and center as we elevate the human experience.

app_details.asset_description:
HHS NextGen is the industry leading solution for Integrated Eligibility. Implemented in over 25 states, HHS NextGen has transformed integrated case management and eligibility determination for programs such as Medicaid, SNAP, TANF, and Child Care. Today, HHS NextGen has been rearchitected atop the Salesforce cloud platform and infused with the power of the govCONNECT platform to provide world-class user experience, scalability, and functional capability. 

Related Solutions: 
• Integrated Eligibility Self-Service Web App
• Integrated Eligibility Self-Service Mobile App
• EBT Mobile App

app_details.asset_description: The Health Insurance Premium Program Tool is a Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for enabling state agencies to operationalize HIPP. Combining features of eligibility determination with program effectiveness measurements, Deloitte’s HIPP Tool provides comprehensive capabilities for States to realize significant Medicaid program savings.
app_details.short_description: Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for enabling state agencies to operationalize HIPP. This solution combines features of eligibility determination with program effectiveness measurements to provide comprehensive capabilities for States to realize significant Medicaid program savings.

app_details.asset_description:
Hearings and Appeals Module is a standalone Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for operationalizing processes for managing and scheduling hearings and appeals cases, across any number of programs. Key functionality includes automatic appointment scheduling, electronic dockets, time tracking, case tracking, and contact management. 

Derived from a user-centric design approach, the Hearings and Appeals module functionality and capabilities align to the workflow-based needs of schedulers, administrative law judges (ALJs), attorneys and other business users. By designing the application based on specific roles, the module drives the efficient completion of the hearings and appeals case management and scheduling tasks.
app_details.short_description: Standalone Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for operationalizing processes for managing and scheduling hearings and appeals cases, across any number of programs. Key functionality includes automatic appointment scheduling, electronic dockets, time tracking, case tracking, and contact management.

The spend management tool has the ability to tie into existing contract management tools such as FPDS, USA Spending, and other source systems that have integration capabilities.
app_details.short_description: Enables large contracting providers the ability to track contract details  and status, vendor contact management, planned and actual spend, and reporting/dashboards. The spend management tool has the ability to tie into existing contract management tools such as FPDS, USA Spending, and other source systems that have integration capabilities.

app_details.asset_description: The Conference Room Scheduler is designed to simplify the process of reserving conference rooms and other spaces within an office or shared workplace. The application ensures that organizers have the necessary accommodations for important meetings, and at the same time, office managers maintain an accurate, up-to-date view of how company resources are being utilized. The Conference Room Scheduler consists of a front-end to allow an organizer to submit requests and an administrative back-end to allow administrators to review and manage room reservations and status.
app_details.short_description: Simplifies the process of reserving conference rooms and other spaces within an office or shared workplace. The application ensures that organizers have the necessary accommodations for important meetings, and at the same time, office managers maintain an accurate, up-to-date view of how company resources are being utilized. The Conference Room Scheduler consists of a front-end to allow an organizer to submit requests and an administrative back-end to allow administrators to review and manage room reservations and status.

app_details.asset_description:
The CBP LaunchPad provides employees a one stop shop to start or “launch” their day. The CBP LaunchPad is a centralized location where end-users can access all of their Salesforce applications, as well as other business applications (i.e., SharePoint, SAP, Oracle, etc.). Each app tile is data driven and controlled by metadata, attributes, and related objects making it flexible, configurable, and easily scalable. This solution is connected to CBP’s Active Directory and provides PIV Authenticated Single Sign-On to allow users to authenticate and access all of their applications without having to login in to different applications multiple time.

The CBP LaunchPad also facilitates the case management and user access request lifecycle around an application. Users can submit tickets (enhancement requests, bugs) pertaining to an application which creates a case that is then triaged by the CBP Salesforce Center of Excellence. Users can also submit requests for access to applications which routes to their direct supervisor, business owner, and Salesforce CoE for approval as applicable.
app_details.short_description: One-stop shop for end-users to "launch" their day by providing a centralized location to access all of their Salesforce applications, as well as other business applications (i.e., SharePoint, SAP, Oracle, etc.) via data driven app tiles that are controlled by metadata, attributes, and related objects making it flexible, configurable, and easily scalable. This solution is connected to CBP’s Active Directory and provides PIV Authenticated Single Sign-On to allow users to authenticate and access all of their applications without having to login in to different applications multiple time.

app_details.implemented: American Electric Power (AEP), Pipeline Hazardous Materials Safety Administration (PHMSA)
app_details.asset_description: Dynamic Case Management (DCM) is a tool-neutral framework to capture, process, and analyze case-related data, improve customer service, drive process efficiency, and enable streamlined data analysis. DCM allows organizations to integrate case and work-flow processing, data analytics and case management best practices on a scalable, technology-neutral, enterprise platform. DCM is able to provide consistent and real-time access to data through a multitude of different channels (web and mobile) while improving the timeliness, quality, and efficiency of services provided to stakeholders. DCM has consistently provided a lower cost of ownership and complexity over existing legacy landscapes while provide the requisite flexibility and scalability to address changing requirements.
app_details.short_description: Tool neutral framework to capture, process, and analyze case-related data, improve customer service, drive process efficiency, and enable streamlined data analysis by allowing organizations to integrate case and work-flow processing, data analytics, and case management best practices on a scalable, technology-neutral, enterprise platform. DCM is able to provide consistent and real-time access to data through a multitude of different channels (web and mobile) while improving the timeliness, quality, and efficiency of services provided to stakeholders.

app_details.asset_description: govCONNECT Framework is a robust collection of framework components that sit atop the Salesforce platform. The govCONNECT Framework enables rapid delivery of complex government solutions with high quality and lower-cost.
app_details.short_description: Robust collection of framework components that sit atop the Salesforce platform. The govCONNECT Framework enables rapid delivery of complex government solutions with high quality and lower-cost.

app_details.asset_description:
To meet CFPB’s goals, Deloitte implemented a state-of-the-art CRM system on the Salesforce platform called Mosaic that supports the scalability, agility, and quality of consumer inquiry and complaint handling services and tools. Mosaic streamlines complaint submission using a “turbo-tax” like data-driven process, incorporates a complex workflow that efficiently and accurately routes complaints to companies, and provides three portals for company, government, and congressional users to easily manage and track the status of complaints.

Mosaic’s improved submission form enhances complaint submitter experience and incorporates data-driven questions that improve cross-channel consistency. Mosaic’s complaint dashboards in the stakeholder portals enable faster and easier complaint management for company, government, and congressional users while also providing enhanced search and export features to improve analysis of complaint data. Mosaic’s flexibility and strong data architecture provide CFPB with the tools to grow and evolve as demand for consumer complaint services increases.
app_details.short_description: State-of-the-art CRM system on the Salesforce platform that supports the scalability, agility, and quality of consumer inquiry and complaint handling services and tools. Mosaic streamlines complaint submission using a “turbo-tax” like data-driven process, incorporates a complex workflow that efficiently and accurately routes complaints to companies, and provides three portals for company, government, and congressional users to easily manage and track the status of complaints.

app_details.asset_description: The Asset Tracker Application enables accurate inventory tracking of assets, management of asset requests, and the assignment of assets to staff. The application provides a single location for operators to manage inventories and items, as well as, requests. The scalability and flexibility of this application allows for a variety of asset types to be tracked within the system.
app_details.short_description: Enables accurate inventory tracking of assets, management of asset requests, and the assignment of assets to staff. The application provides a single location for operators to manage inventories and items, as well as, requests. The scalability and flexibility of this application allows for a variety of asset types to be tracked within the system.

app_details.implemented: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) production org
app_details.asset_description:
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention’s (CDC) National Center for Chronic Disease Prevention and Health is exploring new ways to enhance post-award grants management, performance monitoring, and user experience. CDC is piloting a Salesforce based Award Management Platform (AMP). AMP promotes effective integrated program management, evaluation, and internal and external stakeholder collaboration for cooperative agreements. AMP provides configurable program-specific communities and standardizes the user experience.
 
AMP is aimed at improving the Program Staff and Grant Recipients experience by: i) enabling knowledge management, collaboration, and sharing within and across programs; ii) easing technical assistance (TA) submission, tracking, and increasing TA quality; iii) improving data collection and analysis related to performance and budget monitoring; and, iv) creating a commonly used but customizable platform to improve post-award management for a portfolio of diverse programs and stakeholders.
app_details.short_description: Salesforce based Award Management Platform (AMP) that promotes effective integrated program management, evaluation, and internal and external stakeholder collaboration for cooperative agreements. AMP provides configurable program-specific communities and standardizes the user experience.
app_details.asset_contacts: Sasa Eric, Madhavi Karnik, Scott Klisures

app_details.asset_description: Figura is a Deloitte-proprietary, cloud-based, low-code application development platform. With a built-in UI Framework tool and a configurable code generation script, Figura enables rapid application development in a variety of destination technology stacks such as Salesforce, React, Angular, and Java.
app_details.short_description: Cloud-based, low-code application development platform with a built-in UI Framework tool and a configurable code generation script, Figura enables rapid application development in a variety of destination technology stacks such as Salesforce, React, Angular, and Java.

app_details.asset_description: Provides standard API to upload, store,  scan, categorize, retrieve, view and annotate documents.
app_details.short_description: Provides standard API to upload, store,  scan, categorize, retrieve, view and annotate documents.

app_details.asset_description: The MCI Microservice is a lightweight tool that can be used within our solutions to provide clients with customizable MCI services depending on their functional needs and readiness.​ The MCI Microservice is an efficient, robust, transparent, and configurable single source repository that unifies real-time updates from multiple sources and publishes to subscribing agencies.
app_details.short_description: Lightweight tool that can be used within our solutions to provide clients with customizable MCI services depending on their functional needs and readiness.​ The MCI Microservice is an efficient, robust, transparent, and configurable single source repository that unifies real-time updates from multiple sources and publishes to subscribing agencies.

app_details.asset_description:
CC Managed Services is an managed Software as a Service platform that provides a secure and compliant system with minimal maintenance overhead for various day to day infrastructure management. 
CC Microservices is an efficient, robust, transparent, and configurable single source repository that provides platform independent solution for various correspondence needs. CC Microservices can be plugged with any major service provider like OpenText, GMC Software, Xerox (XMPie) etc.
app_details.short_description: Managed Software as a Service platform that provides a secure and compliant system with minimal maintenance overhead for various day to day infrastructure management. CC Microservices is an efficient, robust, transparent, and configurable single source repository that provides platform independent solution for various correspondence needs that can be plugged with any major service provider like OpenText, GMC Software, Xerox (XMPie) etc.

app_details.asset_description:
LandConnect manages submission, approval, inspections, and tracking of land claims. The product seamlessly integrates with geo-spatial software and databases along with a rules engine that process complex approval rules and a “concierge” facility to help claimants through the application process

This tool facilitates land claim completion by supporting multiple user personas throughout the claim’s lifecycle. Once the claimant researches and submits their claim, it will be assigned to a Claims Processer’s work queue. The next step in the process will be completed by the Inspector who will perform inspections within the claim period. During the entire claim lifecycle, Claims Processors are able to respond to Claimants and provide guidance whiles simultaneously processing claims using the Service Console.
app_details.short_description: Tool that manages submission, approval, inspections, and tracking of land claims. The product seamlessly integrates with geo-spatial software and databases along with a rules engine that process complex approval rules and a “concierge” facility to help claimants through the application process

app_details.asset_description: Tours management is a self-service interface which enable an organization's staff to schedule campus/complex tours from an accessible, user-friendly web interface. The system manages tour capacity and availability and can set future schedules based on a set of configurable rules. The group or office managing tours can administer all settings from a back-end administrative console. Allowing end user to request and track their own tours reduces the number of tour related inquiries to virtually zero.
app_details.short_description: Self-service interface which enable an organization's staff to schedule campus/complex tours from an accessible, user-friendly web interface. The system manages tour capacity and availability and can set future schedules based on a set of configurable rules via administrative console (back-end).

app_details.asset_description: Allows any group who provides facilities services to provide their end-users with an easily accessible, web intake form. The Facilities Requests app also provides an administrative back-end application which allows the facilities management service provider to create, review, and manage facilities requests while also tracking the associated costs. This includes the ability to associate a facilities request to one or many invoices so that cost can be tracked across fiscal years. The application is designed to increase the efficiency in submitting and managing facilities requests.
app_details.short_description: Allows any group who provides facilities services to provide their end-users with an easily accessible, web intake form. The Facilities Requests app also provides an administrative back-end application which allows the facilities management service provider to create, review, and manage facilities requests while also tracking the associated costs.

app_details.asset_description:
During recent user fee re-negotiations, FDA agreed to modernize their time reporting systems and to capture time daily for all user fee funded activities beginning in Fiscal Year 2019. The successful implementation of a modernized time reporting system is critical to satisfy the commitments made to industry, but moreover it will become the primary data source to support resource capacity planning.

The first iteration of ITR enables CDER employees to report time to activities, applications, and products related to safety and efficacy validation required in the regulatory review process. By utilizing the Salesforce platform, the FDA has enabled modernization in data collection and analytical capabilities.

The Insight Time Reporting system has been designed and developed to meet the multi-tier hierarchy structure required by CDER and is scalable to support additional Center requirements with configurable user profiles that limit access to only those activities specific to an individual’s Center/Office/Role. 
The system is easy to use, the process to enter time is efficient, and the system is scalable to capture activities at a much more granular level to support resource capacity planning.
app_details.short_description: Modern time reporting system that allows users to capture their daily time for all user fee funded activities. The system was designed and developed to meet the multi-tier hierarchy structure required by the FDA (CDER) and is scalable to support additional Center requirements with configurable user profiles that limit access to only those activities specific to an individual’s Center/Office/Role.

app_details.asset_description: Onboarding Gateway is an interactive portal that supports tracking of an individual’s onboarding status. This tool is available to both Applicants (Federal Employees and Contractors) and Managers.  The solution consists of two components: an Applicant-facing community and a back-end Manager view for application management.  This further extends itself to existing data sources through integration with the Personal Identity Verification (PIV) system for data ingestion and the Access Management System (AMS) to support single-sign-on capabilities.
app_details.short_description: Interactive portal that supports tracking of an individual’s onboarding status via two portals: an Applicant-facing community and a back-end Manager view for application management.  This further extends itself to existing data sources through integration with the Personal Identity Verification (PIV) system for data ingestion and the Access Management System (AMS) to support single-sign-on capabilities.

app_details.asset_description:
GoCase Learning is a mobile training application that enables professionals to gain the skills they need to be field experts on day one in a safe and consequence-free environment.

• GoCase Learning solves many of the business issues that exist in today’s field work training material. Today’s training may provide the what, when, where, and why of interviewing, but this application is explicitly designed to enable exploration of the “how” of interviewing. GoCase Learning allows users to take multiple approaches or paths to the same outcome, exploring effectiveness of varying approaches, and evaluating which approach is best suited for each learner.
• GoCase Learning provides personalized feedback on mock interview performance so trainees can refine their skills and try new approaches as they experience each new scenario.
• GoCase Learning offers modules for building interview skills, refining critical thinking and observation skills.
• Case management skills are tested as trainees manage multiple simulated cases at a time, and the trainees are challenged to actively track ongoing relationships with individuals across those cases.
• GoCase Learning has a Story Editor that allows users to create their own scenarios, characters, and conversations that can then be used in the app. This allows for custom stories to be created and tested that relate to all types of scenarios.

Related Solutions:
• GoCase VR
• GoCase Community
app_details.short_description: Mobile training application that enables professionals to gain the skills they need to be field experts on day one in a safe and consequence-free environment. Users are prompted with multiple choice questions that evaluate their response and provide live feedback on improvement areas. GoCase Learning paired with the Story Editor application allows its users to generate new content to share with their team using the mobile app.

app_details.asset_description:
GoCase VR allows field work trainees to experience real-life scenarios in a virtual reality environment. The program uses 3D images of buildings, homes, furniture, and everyday objects to simulate real-life situations in the field in an interactive space where trainees can explore the environment and identify risks and issues.

• GoCase VR is designed to cover a wide breadth of scenarios. As trainees perform actions in the application, the program provides feedback to help them learn how to handle each situation.
• GoCase VR lowers costs for organizations by eliminating the need for dedicated training facilities and keeping employees engaged which can lower the amount of attrition. Trainees are able to complete the training at their desks, or even remotely at their own homes, using their own devices. GoCase VR replaces reading outdated textbooks and memorizing written training material with an exciting program that teaches trainees how to make real-time decisions in lifelike scenarios in a safe virtual environment.
• GoCase VR is cloud hosted so it can be updated with specific scenarios and deployed to all users without the need to purchase new hardware bringing collaboration from central offices to their homes or local offices.

Related Solutions:
• GoCase Learning
• GoCase Community
app_details.short_description: Mobile and desktop based application that allows field work trainees to experience real-life scenarios in a virtual reality environment from any location. The application uses 3D images of buildings, homes, furniture, and everyday objects to simulate real-life situations in the field in an interactive space where trainees can explore the environment and identify risks and issues while receiving feedback on areas they need to sharpen their skills.

app_details.asset_description:
GoCase Community is an online site for content collaboration shared throughout the country by allowing users to share their custom characters, stories, and lesson plans for GoCase applications.

• GoCase Community creates a virtual team network for individuals working in the Child Welfare space. GoCase Community promotes creativity, sharing of custom content, and feedback mechanisms to increase the effectiveness of the GoCase App experience.
• GoCase Community contains levels and characters from GoCase Learning. These levels are all easily accessible through a website with a search toolbar.
• Using search filters, users can quickly search for the exact scenarios that relate to the community to use in GoCase Learning.
• Users may upload levels and characters to share with the Community to get valuable feedback and allow others to build upon the creation!
• Users can download levels and characters directly to the application and share with their team.

Related Solutions:
• GoCase Learning
• GoCase VR
app_details.short_description: Cloud-based online site for content collaboration shared throughout the country by allowing users to share their custom characters, stories, and lesson plans for GoCase applications. By creating a virtual team environment, GoCase Community allows users the ability to download user created content to share with their teams.
